title: Talking Tales: A Llama Stole My Flashlight
description: Molly and her Uncle Leon are all set for their weekend camp out. That is until Uncle Leon asks Molly to get her flashlight. Will Uncle Leon believe Molly's web of seemingly tall tales? This humorous story is a great way for any parent or therapist to target the “L” sound. There are over 140 occurrences of “L” in various word locations to help improve speech development. This book also includes tips for parents who are working with the child’s speech at home. A firm believer in helping children learn while having fun, Graham has written the books in the Talking Tales series to be entertaining reads for any child, regardless of speech skills.
author: Erica Graham
